content.description: This landmark boulder is along the old way in to the Main Wall from the SE, about 5-10 minutes before you reach the cliff. Since people are coming in from Sawyer Pond Tr now, this boulder will probably be lost back into the woods. It is tall, about 30 feet at it's peak, but has a good, featured 18 ft overhanging orange wall on it's north side and good lines from 8 to 20 feet on the west.
